name: Oxford Lane Capital Corp.
description: Oxford Lane Capital Corp. is a publicly traded investment management firm focused on generating current income and capital appreciation through investing in structured finance and credit investments. Established in 2012, the company primarily invests in debt and equity tranches of collateralized loan obligations (CLOs), which are pooled portfolios of leveraged loans. Oxford Lane aims to provide a high level of current income to its shareholders while maintaining a focus on risk management. The firm employs a disciplined investment strategy that seeks to identify attractive investment opportunities in the credit markets, leveraging its expertise and extensive network in the industry. Through its investment approach, Oxford Lane has established a reputation for strong performance and reliable dividend distributions, appealing to income-focused investors. The company is dedicated to transparency and actively communicates with its shareholders about its investment strategies and performance metrics. As part of its commitment to shareholder value, Oxford Lane regularly assesses its portfolio to ensure alignment with market trends and economic conditions.

seo.meta_title: Oxford Lane Capital Corp. | Investment Management
seo.meta_description: Explore Oxford Lane Capital Corp., a leader in structured finance investments focusing on CLOs. Discover our investment strategies and commitment to current income.

faq.question: What does Oxford Lane Capital do?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital focuses on investing in structured finance products, particularly collateralized loan obligations (CLOs).

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Oxford Lane Capital?
faq.answer: Jonathan Cohen is the CEO of Oxford Lane Capital Corp.

faq.question: Where is Oxford Lane Capital headquartered?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital is headquartered in Greenwich, Connecticut, USA.

faq.question: What types of investments does Oxford Lane Capital make?
faq.answer: The company primarily invests in debt and equity tranches of collateralized loan obligations (CLOs).

faq.question: When was Oxford Lane Capital founded?
faq.answer: Oxford Lane Capital was founded in 2012.
